header: The Lord Will Rescue Israel and Judah

verse: The Lord God of Israel said, “Jeremiah, get a scroll and write down everything I have told you.
Someday I will let my people from both Israel and Judah return to the land I gave their ancestors.”
Then the Lord told me to say to Israel and Judah:

header: The Lord Will Heal Israel and Judah
The Lord Will Rescue Israel and Judah
